title: Misleading Investment Guarantee
description: The email promises a 50% return in one month, which is unrealistic and violates financial advertising rules.
proposedSolution: Remove the unrealistic return guarantee and include appropriate risk disclosures.

title: False Risk-Free Statement
description: The email states that 'This investment is 100% risk-free,' which is misleading and non-compliant.
proposedSolution: Eliminate the 'risk-free' language and replace it with a balanced risk disclosure.
